nodes.text: A human male was the father of Din Djarin. When their home came under attack from Separatist forces during the Clone Wars, Djarin's father and mother attempted to hide their son from the enemy battle droids. Djarin's parents were killed, and Djarin himself was found by a B2-series super battle droid, but was rescued by a Mandalorian warrior, who took him in as a foundling.
